ani2x-qm.spec_description: QM optimization using the method/basis on which ANI2x is trained

dataset_tagline: OptimizationDataset of short peptides in various contexts, including disulfide bridges.
description: OptimizationDataset of short peptides in various contexts, including disulfide bridges.

metadata.short_description: OptimizationDataset of short peptides in various contexts, including disulfide bridges.
metadata.long_description: OptimizationDataset of short peptides in various contexts, including disulfide bridges. The source PEPCONF dataset is documented in [Nature Scientific Data](https://www.nature.com/articles/sdata2018310), and available on [GitHub](https://github.com/aoterodelaroza/pepconf). This dataset extracts the molecules that were simulated, but uses the QCSubmit infrastructure to generate a new `OptimizationDataset`, so does not use the original conformers.
